constituent: fly, hook, propeller, measuring box, thousand, needles, propeller2
heisigStory: The two large hooks have little propellers (the two drops on each hook) attached to them for flying. Beneath is the measuring box, which serves as the body of this flying contraption. The stroke order will cause some problems, so take care with it.
koohiiStory1: Hooks with small wings attached look like hummingbirds with a long beak. Two hummingbirds are trying to fly away with our little measuring box. What do they want it for?
koohiiStory2: Two hummingbirds flying into a measuring box serving as a bird feeder…　RTK2:　ヒ　飛行機　ひこうき(airplane).
readingExamples: 飛ばす (と.ばす), 飛ぶ (と.ぶ)
words: to kick away, to kick off, to kick (someone), to refuse, to reject
jump in, leap in, plunge into, dive
jump out, rush out, fly out, appear suddenly, protrude, project
jump, fly, leap, spring, bound, hop
